Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2018...
Had first career hit on 9/22/2019, off Deangelo Barragan (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2020, off Rodney Hammes (COL)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2020, hitting .259 with 15 HR, 78 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2021, hitting .520 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Detroit on 5/16/2022 (Going to DET: SS Robert Guerriero. Going to STL: LF Daniel Delee, SS Bobby Speck, 3B Adolfo Dinh, P Carl Harden)...
Traded from Detroit to New York on 7/10/2022 (Going to DET: C Issac Scott, P Jason Saterfiel. Going to NY: SS Robert Guerriero, P Deangelo Montejano, C Leo Vinyals)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2022, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,421,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2023, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 7/6/2023...
Injured on 9/20/2023 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,114,286 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 4/26/2024...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,114,286 through salary arbitration...
9/6/2025: Signed a contract extension with New York , $14,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 5/14/2026 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/20/2026 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/5/2027 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
